description: Politely auto-create a .code-workspace when opening a folder, using safe heuristics, and reopen VS Code on it.
cfg.title: Auto Workspace Creator
cfg.enabled: Enable automatic workspace creation when appropriate.
cfg.confirmationMode: Prompt policy before creating a workspace file.
cfg.writeToRepoRoot: If the open folder is inside a Git repo, create the workspace at the repo root.
cfg.wsNamePattern: Pattern for naming the workspace file.
cfg.sanitizeName: Sanitize invalid characters in the generated workspace filename.
cfg.searchDepth: Directory traversal limits for workspace detection.
cfg.ignorePaths: Path prefixes to ignore for safety.
cfg.keyProjectFiles: Presence of any of these files signals a project. Glob patterns supported for *.sln.
cmd.findNearest: Auto Workspace Creator: Find & Open Nearest
